name: immersion
content:
immersion noun [C or U]
(INVOLVEMENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of becoming completely involved in something: Total immersion in a videogame is almost like living another life.
the process of learning a language or skill by using nothing else but that language or skill: We have all learned a complex set of grammar rules simply by immersion in a language since birth. advocates of the immersion method of language learning
